text: Ani jya divasi kaphiranna jahannamacya kinaryasi anale ja'ila, (tevha sangitale ja'ila) ki tumhi apali satkarme aihika jivanataca sampavuna takalita ani tyancyapasuna labha prapta karuna ghetala, tevha aja tumhala apamanadayaka siksa-yataneca danda dila ja'ila, ya karanane ki tumhi dharativara ahankara karita hote ani ya karananehi ki tumhi adesace palana karita navhate
